summary: ENGINE HAS STALLED TWICE WHILE IN OPERATION.  FIRST TIME WHILE BACKING OUT OF A PARKING SPACE,SECOND TIME WHILE DRIVING FORWARD IN TRAFFIC ON THE HIGHWAY.  IN BOTH INSTANCES HAD TO COME TO A COMPLETE STOP, PLACE VEHICLE INTO PARK, SHUT OFF THE IGNITION AND THEN RESTART.  BOTH INSTANCES VEHICLE WAS IN MOTION.  SECOND INSTANCE WAS IN MOVING TRAFFIC AND HAD TO PULL ONTO THE ROAD SHOULDER OUT OF TRAFFIC IN ORDER TO STOP AS VEHICLE WOULD NOT RESTART WHILE IN MOTION.  DEALER CHECKED AND FOUND NO CODES STORED IN THE VEHICLE'S COMPUTER, THUS NO ACTION TAKEN TO ADDRESS THIS ISSUE.
